[b]Information about album[/b]: 
The collaboration with Massimo Bubola, leading to results comparable to those achieved with Fabrizio De AndrÃƒÂ¨. Are denounced in no uncertain terms the various defects of Tangentopoli's Italy. Follow quarrels and controversies but "Storie d'Italia" remains to witness the special moment of creativity reached with the union of artists as diverse but equally extraordinary. The lyrics are by Marino Severini and Massimo Bubola, the music by Sandro Severini and Bubola.
